channel.title: [508] Need Help [508]
channel.description:
Ok, my current problem is that I am making a new home on a 508 server. I have made it so when you are a new player when you log in you go to a certain spot. But, when you do the command ::home you go to a different spot. I need help with changing the coords of the current ::home to the other spot I have selected. I also would like to add 1-2 bank stalls at the current spot I have picked out for my home. I would also like to add Shop NPCs.
If you can help me with these problems please comment. Thank You.

item.title: [508] Need Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
